EmailTemplate.name: CASE: Software Change Resolution
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for environment access: Case {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
This issue has been addressed via a software change. The case will be set to Resolved.
Release Notes Reference: <Insert Jira #>
Snapshot Detail: <Release and Snapshot #>
App/Package Detail: <App/Package detail>
For more information about this update please review the Release Notes here https://customercommunity.technologyonecorp.com/s/article/Release-Notes
SaaS Customers:
Deployment of Fastline snapshots are posted regularly in the TechnologyOne Announcements Group in the Customer Community https://customercommunity.technologyonecorp.com/s/group/0F90f000000DEHlCAO/technologyone-announcements
Mainline updates are posted in the SaaS Group: https://customercommunity.technologyonecorp.com/s/group/0F9G00000000BkeKAE/saas
Information on the SaaS Snapshot Release Process is available here: https://customercommunity.technologyonecorp.com/s/article/Snapshot-Release
Identifying which Snapshot you have: 2020A and above: https://customercommunity.technologyonecorp.com/s/article/What-Snapshot-am-I-on-2020A-and-above
2019B and above: https://customercommunity.technologyonecorp.com/s/article/What-Snapshot-and-I-On-2019B-and-above
On-Premise Customers: The relevant Apps/Packages are now available for download from enterprise App Store.
Kind regards, TechnologyOne Support
TechnologyOne accepts no liability for this email or its attachments. It is for the intended recipient only. More info Stop_Spam@TechnologyOneCorp.com
